history.narrative: Law 4-194, “Child Restraint Act of 1982,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 4-434, which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Environmental Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 16, 1982, and December 14, 1982, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 28, 1982, it was assigned Act No. 4-278 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
